pr_title: Adjust path of default cacerts depending on flavors of GraalVM

timeline.bodyHTML:
Since the only thing that changes is the Path, I'd just change that:

Suggested change
Path jdk8GraalVmCacertsPath = Paths.get(graalVmHome, "jre", "lib", "security", "cacerts");
if (Files.exists(jdk8GraalVmCacertsPath)) {
sslTrustStoreSystemProperty
.produce(new SslTrustStoreSystemPropertyBuildItem(jdk8GraalVmCacertsPath.toString()));
} else {
sslTrustStoreSystemProperty.produce(
new SslTrustStoreSystemPropertyBuildItem(
Paths.get(graalVmHome, "lib", "security", "cacerts").toString()));
}
Path graalVmCacertsPath = Paths.get(graalVmHome, "jre", "lib", "security", "cacerts");
if (!Files.exists(graalVmCacertsPath)) {
graalVmCacertsPath = Paths.get(graalVmHome, "lib", "security", "cacerts");
}
// This is useful for testing but the user will have to override it.
sslTrustStoreSystemProperty.produce(new SslTrustStoreSystemPropertyBuildItem(graalVmCacertsPath.toString()));
